Name: Kimberlé Crenshaw
Biography: A pioneering scholar and writer on civil rights, critical race theory, Black feminist legal theory, and race, racism and the law.

Name: Taylor Swift
Biography: An American singer-songwriter who has received critical praise and wide media coverage.

Name: Brandi Carlile
Biography: An American singer-songwriter and producer whose music spans many genres, including folk rock, alternative country, Americana, and classic rock.

Name: Robert Solow
Biography: An American economist whose work on the theory of economic growth culminated in the exogenous growth model named after him.

Name: Esther Duflo
Biography: A French–American economist who is a professor of Poverty Alleviation and Development Economics at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.

Name: Yuval Noah Harari
Biography: An Israeli historian and professor in the Department of History at the Hebrew University of Jerusalem.

Name: Ruta Sepetys
Biography: A Lithuanian-American writer of historical fiction.

Name: Florence Pugh
Biography: An English actress who made her acting debut in 2014 in the drama film The Falling.

Name: Candace Parker
Biography: An American professional basketball player for the Las Vegas Aces of the Women's National Basketball Association.

Name: Serena Williams
Biography: An American former tennis player that is considered among the greatest tennis players of all time.
